content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 60, "index": 13}, {"type": "lime_concrete", "quantity": 15, "index": 17}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 21, "index": 36}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 39}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]

thought: To craft jungle_fence, I need to first craft jungle_planks. Jungle_planks requires placing 1 stripped_jungle_log in the crafting table, therefore I will move the stripped_jungle_log to the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 60, "index": 13}, {"type": "lime_concrete", "quantity": 15, "index": 17}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 21, "index": 36}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 39}]
thought: Now I can craft the jungle_planks by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4
